title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Nominate Individual to a Key Administration Post â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
May 14, 2019
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to nominate the following individual to a key position in his Administration:Stephen R. Bough of Missouri, to be a Member of the Board of Trustees of the Harry S. Truman Scholarship Foundation (Federal Court Rep.), for the remainder of a six-year term expiring December 10, 2021.
